altername_name: S.F.3.D Point X Senryou Sakusen: Operation Thanksgiving
name: S.F.3.D Original: Operation Thanksgiving
overview: Point X Senryou Sakusen – S.F.3.D. Original – Operation Thanksgiving is a turn based strategy game for one player that was developed by Victor Interactive Software Inc., Released in 1986. In it you pick 8 mechs and tanks and have to find the hostile mechs and tanks and eliminate them. Some units have a limited amount of rockets to fire, which deal more damage than the regular laser.
